sentence.Network_en: From across the desk she gave him a witheringly imperious look.
sentence.Network_cn: 她从桌子对面扫了他一眼，目光咄咄逼人，凌利而专横。

sentence.Network_en: Guns fired witheringly at the railroad cars.
sentence.Network_cn: 枪一起对着列车车厢猛烈地、摧毁性地扫射.

sentence.Network_en: Katherine looked briefly and witheringly at Charley Lynch.
sentence.Network_cn: 凯瑟琳轻蔑地看了查利?林奇一眼.

sentences.sentence: "guns fired witheringly at the railroad cars"

auth_sentence.content: Instead of responding witheringly, Tavi put her head down.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead of responding witheringly, Tavi put her head down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead of responding witheringly, Tavi put her head down.

auth_sentence.content: I heard my husband querying in my mind contemptuously, witheringly.
auth_sentence.res_content: I heard my husband querying in my mind contemptuously, witheringly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I heard my husband querying in my mind contemptuously, witheringly.

baesInfo.translate_result: withering使人畏缩的，使人害羞的，使人难堪的
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
